## ProgramBuilder.buildCompute() method

Generates shader code for a compute program

**Signature:**

```typescript
buildCompute(options: PBComputeOptions): readonly [string, BindGroupLayout[]];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [PBComputeOptions](doc/markdown/./device.pbcomputeoptions.md) | The build programs |

**Returns:**

readonly \[string, [BindGroupLayout](doc/markdown/./device.bindgrouplayout.md)<!-- -->\[\]\]

a tuple made by compute shader source and bind group layouts, or null if build failed
